name: @ideal-postcodes/api-typings
description: Typings and other useful javascript abstractions for interacting with the Ideal-Postcodes.co.uk API

scripts.docs: ./node_modules/.bin/typedoc --mode file --target ES3 --out docs/ --name 'Ideal Postcodes API Typings' --includeDeclarations --theme minimal --excludePrivate --hideGenerator --composite lib/index.ts --excludeExternals lib/

author: Ideal Postcodes
